thread.section_title: Alpha Flight Guru Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Alpha Flight Guru | alphaflightguru.com
thread.title: Vida
thread.title_full: Alpha Flight Guru reviewed by Vida

author: Vida
title: Vida
text: I got contacted by Boris, within 10mins after I made my flight request online. He was very friendly and extremely helpful. He was able to give me several good options of flight schedule and fare which I couldn't find online for Business class with the specific criteria I had in mind. I really appreciate the professional services from Alpha Flight Guru.
